long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
(Note: We are an independent third-party company and are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Meta Platforms, Inc., Facebook, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.)

No more worries about getting Fb high definition ad videos and ad data! Our one-click export tool not only allows you to easily download high resolution ad videos, but also master all ad data at the same time.

ğŸ‰ Features:
ğŸ”¥ Simple operation: The simple and intuitive interface design makes it easy for you to get started without the need for a complex learning process.
ğŸ”¥ Rich material library: Provides massive ad video materials, ad titles, ad copywriting, etc., making your ad works more colorful.
ğŸ”¥ High definition download: Supports multiple ad resolutions and ad format downloads, ensuring that your ad materials present the best results on different platforms.
ğŸ”¥ Data download: You can obtain the ad title, CTA, ad likes, ad landing page link, and ad video URL at once.
ğŸ’¡Ad library is not only a tool for collecting ad, but also a powerful assistant for realizing your ad creative dreams. With it, you can easily create professional-level ad video works, showcasing your unique talents and creativity.

ğŸ” Common questions:
Q1: What operating systems does the software support? Answer: We support Windows and MacOS to ensure that your ad collection is not limited by the platform.
Q2: Do I need to pay? Answer: We offer a 7-day free trial. If you are satisfied with the experience, you can renew it for a long time.
Q3: Are there any tutorials available for learning? Answer: Of course! We provide detailed ad library tutorials and online help to help you easily master the software usage skills.

ğŸ Experience ad video collection artifact now, let your inspiration fly infinitely! For more detailed information and functions, please visit our official website AdLibrary.ai understand.
